longDescription: Developed under the guidance of my college's cybersecurity club, this repository is a comprehensive and curated collection of resources for learning ethical hacking. It organizes high-quality videos, articles, and my personal concise notes into a structured learning path. Topics range from foundational networking concepts and Linux commands to advanced penetration testing techniques, web application vulnerabilities, and cryptography. This guide serves as a valuable, ever-growing knowledge base for aspiring cybersecurity professionals to build their skills systematically.
